page.title: 18Being unemployed
page.content: During my working days I had to be up at 6.30,now that there is no immediate rush I am up for 8 o'clock.My day in general starts by taking the children to school,one{of life's pleasures that {I had not experienced before. On returning home I go to see my mother,who lives just round the corner.Then I go to town on three separate days to do the bulk of the shopping.When the sun shines I garden;wet weather sees me doing odd jobs about the house. Then it is time to fetch the children from school.I{don't have much time to {be bored,having} hobbies like gardening and wine making to keep me going.So being unemployed means simply having more time on your hands to do the things you enjoy and complete jobs you weren't able to before.
